nodes.text: The super tank was the culmination of an attempt by the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Clone Wars to produce a new type of tank. No known weapon was able to penetrate the tank's heavy armor and ray shield technology. Such defenses made the tank slow, yet robust. They were manufactured by Baktoid Armor Workshop and were first deployed during the Second Battle of Geonosis, though all prototypes were annihilated when Jedi Padawans Ahsoka Tano and Barriss Offee destroyed the Geonosians' droid factory.
